channel.title: Authors on Juan Reyes Herrera
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Juan Reyes Herrera

item.description: Juan Reyes-Herrera is a physicist and researcher specializing in synchrotron radiation, X-ray optics, and radiationâ€“matter interaction techniques. He works as a beamline scientist / researcher at the Elettra Sincrotrone Trieste light source in Italy and has also been affiliated with major European synchrotron facilities such as the European Synchrotron Radiation Facility (ESRF) in Grenoble, France.
